sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit{ pictures:Picture[]=[]; constructor(private pictureService: PictureService, activatedRoot: ActivatedRoute){ let pictureObservable:Observable; pictureObservable=pictureService.getAll(); pictureObservable.subscribe((serverPictures)=>{ this.pictures=serverPictures; }) } ngOnInit():void{ } }
